Class TextButton

java.lang.Object
com.calcgame.main.buttons.FuncButton
com.calcgame.main.buttons.TextButton
All Implemented Interfaces:
CalcButton
public class TextButton extends FuncButton
A simple button that appends text to the screen when clicked

  • Method Details

    • newButton

      public CalcButton newButton(List<String> args, String mod_id)
      Description copied from class: FuncButton
      Creates a new button that has text and an action associated with it.
      Specified by:
      newButton in interface CalcButton
      Overrides:
      newButton in class FuncButton
      Parameters:
      args - arguments for creating the button in the following format:
      0 - the text to be displayed
      1 - the tooltip of the button to be displayed (optional)
      mod_id - the id of the mod that registered this button
      Returns:
      a new CalcButton that appends the text displayed on it to the calculator screen when clicked
